pages.title: Firebox
pages.text: The <item>Firebox/$ is the simplest way to produce heat by burning fuel. Any furnace fuel can be used to produce heat at a constant rate.$(br2)Fuels will burn for 4x longer than in a furnace (config controlled- trust the tooltip), capped at 64000 ticks burntime total per

item (enough for a coal block or a kelp block, less than a lava bucket; config controlled).$(br2)It connects to a <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)cable/$ on the top. <thing>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)Reader circuits/$ measure the fullness of the input.$(br2)
